# Disguise (Hex)
## Overview
*Disguise (Su)*: A witch can change her appearance for a number of hours equal to her class level, as if using *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]*. These hours do not need to be consecutive, but they must be spent in 1-hour increments.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 66
